sectionSubtitle: Career journey in accounting, audit, and financial services.

entries.title: Independent Accounting & Audit Support Consultant
entries.description: Providing accounting and audit support services to small businesses and CA firms.
achievements: Preparing audit schedules and working papers for statutory audits
Handling GST and TDS compliance documentation
Maintaining books of accounts using Tally ERP
Assisting with financial statement preparation and reconciliations

entries.title: PCG Advisor (Executive)
entries.description: Client advisory role in the Private Client Group, handling HNI client portfolios.
achievements: Managed client relationships and portfolio advisory services
Ensured compliance with SEBI regulations and internal policies
Prepared client reports and settlement documentation
Gained exposure to capital markets and financial instruments

entries.title: Freelance Accounting & Business Support
entries.description: Provided bookkeeping and business support services to small businesses.
achievements: Managed day-to-day bookkeeping using Tally ERP
Prepared MIS reports and bank reconciliations
Handled billing, invoicing, and payment follow-ups
Coordinated with clients for document collection and compliance
